item.title: Fantastic Four: All 4 Live-Action The Thing Designs, Ranked
item.description: The Thing is not an easy character to get right, and after four separate attempts to bring the hero to live-action, the cracks have been clear.

item.title: “Light It On Fire And Walk Away”: Ariana DeBose Reveals Her Inspirations For Starring Opposite Ke Huy Quan In Love Hurts
item.description: ScreenRant interviews Academy Award winner Ariana DeBose about her work starring opposite Ke Huy Quan in the new action movie Love Hurts.

item.title: "Pretty Baller Opening": Tom Hanks & Forrest Gump Director's $15M Bomb Gets Generally Positive Response From VFX Artists
item.description: The new collaboration between Tom Hanks and the director of Forrest Gump earns a positive response from VFX artists after bombing at the box office.
